mapper.select:
select count(*) from notice
notice_del_flag = 'N'
and trim(notice_category) = '일반'
and trim(notice_category) = '멤버십'
and trim(notice_category) = '약관개정'
and instr(notice_title, #{keyword}) != 0

select * from ( select notice_num as noticeNum, admin_num as adminNum, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_category as noticeCategory, notice_msg as noticeMsg, notice_date as noticeDate, row_number() over(order by notice_num desc) rnum from notice
notice_del_flag = 'N'
and trim(notice_category) = '일반'
and trim(notice_category) = '멤버십'
and trim(notice_category) = '약관개정'
and instr(notice_title, #{keyword}) != 0
) where rnum between #{startNum} and #{endNum}

select notice_num as noticeNum, admin_num as adminNum, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_category as noticeCategory, notice_msg as noticeMsg, notice_date as noticeDate from notice where notice_num = #{value} and notice_del_flag = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into notice ( notice_num, admin_num, notice_title, notice_category, notice_msg, notice_date, notice_del_flag ) values ( NOTICE_SEQ.nextval, #{adminNum}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeCategory}, #{noticeMsg}, sysdate, 'N' )
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_category = #{noticeCategory}, notice_msg = #{noticeMsg} where notice_num = #{noticeNum} and notice_del_flag = 'N'
update notice set notice_del_flag = 'Y' where notice_num = #{value} and notice_del_flag = 'N'
